welcomePage.title: Objectivity/Assist
welcomePage.intro: This page will help familiarize you with the Objectivity/Assist Eclipse feature. To get started, read the sections below and click on the related links.
welcomePage.item: Objectivity/DB Basics Tutorial To get started learning about Objectivity/DB you can run the Basics Tutorial.
Java Tutorial To get started learning about Objectivity/DB's Java binding you can run the Java Tutorial.
C++ Tutorial To get started learning about Objectivity/DB's C++ binding you can run the C++ Tutorial.
Learn more To learn about the Eclipse workbench you can browse the Workbench User Guide.
